explains: vt. 假装；装作；捏造；想象
vi. 假装；装作；作假；佯作

sentences.en: One morning, I didn't want to go to school, and decided to feign illness.
sentences.cn: 一天早上，我不愿去上学，就决定装病。

sentences.en: I feign dispassion, but I'm not fooling anybody.
sentences.cn: 我装作冷静，虽不是为了欺骗任何人。

sentences.en: Many, in fact, feign love of life to evade love itself.
sentences.cn: 事实上，许多人假装热爱生命，进而逃避爱之本身。
